hadiths.text: Narrated An-Nu'man ibn Bashir: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: about a man who had (unlawful) intercourse with his wife's slave girl: If she made her lawful for him, he will be flogged one hundred lashes; if she did not make her lawful for him, I shall stone him

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يَزْنِي بِجَارِيَةِ امْرَأَتِهِ
chapter.eng-name: A man who commits zina with his wife's slave woman
